alert.note: Alert for Jackson (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 10:40PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Mason and central Jackson Counties through 1115 PM EST... At 1040 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buffalo, or 12 miles north of Winfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Sandyville, Leon, Cottageville, Grimms Landing, Statts Mills, Evans, Given, Southside, Fairplain and Gay. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 127 and 148. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
